service: node-serverless

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x

functions:
  userApi:
    handler: handlers/userHandler.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: users/{proxy+}
          method: any

plugins:
  - serverless-offline  # Add this line

error.message: Serverless plugin "serverless-offline" not found. Make sure it's installed and listed in the "plugins" section of your serverless config file. Use the --debug flag to learn more.
